Name: Lowther Hall Anglican Grammar School Archives

About.Hours & facilities:
Open by appointment only.
General reference assistance available.

About.Access: All records are closed until requested. Written permission required from Principal for some groups of records.

About.Acquisition focus:
Records relating to the establishment in 1920 and day-to-day running of Lowther Hall Anglican Grammar School (formerly known as Lowther Hall Church of
England Grammar School). Limited records also relating to the School's predecessor organisations: Blinkbonnie Ladies' College and Winstow Ladies' College.

About.Major holdings:
School publications, including: The Chronicle (school magazine) 1920 - current; Annual Report 1992 - current; Lowther News 1966 - current.
	
	 
	Administrative records, including: School Council records 1920 - current; Administrative Files; Architectural drawings; Enrolment and Attendance Records 1920 - current. 
	Photographic material. 
	Audio-Visual material. 
	Textiles, including: school uniforms; flags and banners.

About.References: Pyke, Alvin D. The Gold The Blue: A History of Lowther Hall, 1981.
